body_content.explanation: a small, long bread roll (= a small loaf for one person), or a sandwich made using this:
examples: He took a finger roll and stuffed it with tuna and spring onion.
There was a buffet with plates of finger rolls.

body_content.explanation: in basketball, a type of shot (= an attempt to score) in which a player reaches up to the basket with their palm (= the inner part of their hand) facing away from it and rolls the ball off the ends of their fingers:
examples: He scored with his famous finger roll.
